ack.p: We would like to acknowledge a number of people who assisted with this study. We thank the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission for providing data, especially S. Todd, J. Quinn, M. Oliver, and S. Filipek for providing constructive input on the project. J. Cothren, K. Naithani, and J. D. Wilson provided useful suggestions and edits for this project. K.Gido, O. Slav√≠k and M. Fujiwara reviewed this manuscript, providing helpful feedback. The views and opinions expressed herein are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views or policies of the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government or by the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission.
